name: pthiswlk
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wbr(c0, cfv(cpths, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cfv(cwlks, c1), c2))

stmt.origin: syl(wbr(c0, cfv(cpths, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cfv(cwlks, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0[(Paths ` c1)]c2, c0[(Walks ` c1)]c2, c0[(Trails ` c1)]c2)

body.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, cfv(cpths, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cfv(cwlks, c1), c2))
-| wi(wbr(c0, cfv(cpths, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2))
-| wi(wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cfv(cwlks, c1), c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0[(Paths ` c1)]c2 → c0[(Walks ` c1)]c2)
⊣ (c0[(Paths ` c1)]c2 → c0[(Trails ` c1)]c2)
⊣ (c0[(Trails ` c1)]c2 → c0[(Walks ` c1)]c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, cfv(cpths, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cfv(cwlks, c1), c2))
-| wi(wbr(c0, cfv(cpths, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2))
-| wi(wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cfv(cwlks, c1), c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0[(Paths ` c1)]c2 → c0[(Walks ` c1)]c2)
⊣ (c0[(Paths ` c1)]c2 → c0[(Trails ` c1)]c2)
⊣ (c0[(Trails ` c1)]c2 → c0[(Walks ` c1)]c2)

body.origin: |- wi(wbr(c0, cfv(cpths, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, cfv(cpths, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cfv(cwlks, c1), c2))
-| wi(wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cfv(cwlks, c1), c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0[(Paths ` c1)]c2 → c0[(Walks ` c1)]c2)
⊣ (c0[(Trails ` c1)]c2 → c0[(Walks ` c1)]c2)

body.origin: |- wi(wbr(c0, cfv(ctrls, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cfv(cwlks, c1), c2))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wbr(c0, cfv(cpths, c1), c2), wbr(c0, cfv(cwlks, c1), c2))

comment: A path is a walk (in an undirected graph). (Contributed by AV, 6-Feb-2021.)
